__e: I sacrificed everything to do what I thought was right, and things just got worse.
I would have sacrificed my life to have him back with his wife and his son.
There is a life that you promised me, and I have sacrificed a hell of a lot to get it.
She's basically sacrificed her life for me, and I'm willing to do the same for her.
She sacrificed everything for us over and over again, and then we were supposed to be there for her.
I've sacrificed myself for this shit and I'm sick of these cheap shots.
I earned it because I sacrificed my life for you and your people.
Do you have any idea how much I've done since I was first struck by lightning, how many people I've helped with the power that you gave me... what I've sacrificed?
It was nothing. I've always wanted to say I've taken a bullet for someone, and now I can.
Marie, you're wise. What do I say to someone who has turned my whole life around? Who has given up so much of their time and their vacation to make me better?
I didn't know that you were keeping it a secret from him. After everything that he has sacrificed for you, don't you think he deserved the truth?
Uh, Colonel, Gregor said to give him five minutes, but it has been six.
He will read these and know his duty is to the men who've already sacrificed their lives.
I thank you for your time.
We may have sacrificed 200 men but now I know their strength.
Is it all right to live even if other things must die?
What's more important if I'm right, I'll be sacrificed. They've gotta figure I told you, which means you'll be sacrificed.
To get there, a handmaiden has to be sacrificed along with him, according to the book.
